00009 /*
00010 ** RFC 1321 MD5 Message digest calculation.
00011 **
00012 ** Returns a pointer to a sixteen-byte message digest.
00013 */
00014 
00015 
00016 #define MD5_DIGEST_SIZE 16
00017 #define MD5_BLOCK_SIZE  64
00018 
00019 typedef unsigned char MD5_DIGEST[MD5_DIGEST_SIZE];
00020 typedef unsigned long MD5_WORD;
00021 
00022 #ifdef MD5_INTERNAL
00023 
00024 struct MD5_CONTEXT {
00025 
00026         MD5_WORD        A, B, C, D;
00027 
00028         unsigned char blk[MD5_BLOCK_SIZE];
00029         unsigned blk_ptr;
00030         } ;
00031 
00032 void md5_context_init(struct MD5_CONTEXT *);
00033 void md5_context_hash(struct MD5_CONTEXT *, const unsigned char[MD5_BLOCK_SIZE]);
00034 void md5_context_hashstream(struct MD5_CONTEXT *, const void *, unsigned);
00035 void md5_context_endstream(struct MD5_CONTEXT *, unsigned long);
00036 void md5_context_digest(struct MD5_CONTEXT *, MD5_DIGEST);
00037 void md5_context_restore(struct MD5_CONTEXT *, const MD5_DIGEST);
00038 
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 void md5_digest ( const void *msg, unsigned int len, MD5_DIGEST );
